snippet.title: Soul Scathe Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Soul Scathe is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler RPG built to exploit VR with a satisfying melee system and explosive magic abilities that involve gesture-based spellcasting and the ability to fuse spells together.

You awaken as the Valiant Returner, a principal battlemage that died during battle in the past. Losing all sense of your past self, you are revived and guided by the Asapal Deity whom witnessed your last moments. They seek to restore your lost powers and guide you to the outside world.

The game will release July 3rd 2020 on Steam, supporting all PCVR headsets as well as Quest with a link cable. Retails for $20 and will be 10% off during the launch period.

Join the discord channel and twitter:

https://discord.gg/c96QPZk
https://twitter.com/BanditBlueberry

Music Credits: 

* Title: War Drums
* Composer: Alec Koff
* Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2aUe3I-uPj4Er84pjjtAjA

* Title: Hero Nation
* Composer: Maria Rubel [Dreamsfall]
* Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/dreamsfall
